rows.label: tev079001_MSG0001
rows.name:
After being captured by the Ganglion, we were forced
to explore a variety of locations. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079001_MSG0002
rows.name:
We were rarely given any security, so when we were
sent to dangerous areas like Cauldros's polluted zone,
many of our number were eaten by indigens. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079001_MSG0003
rows.name:
When we few survivors made it back to the ship,
we'd find the Ganglion laughing and wagering on how
many of us had survived. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079001_MSG0004
rows.name:
Since they captured us to explore uncharted worlds,
they had little use for us here on Mira, and apparently
intended to dispose of us like so much voltant. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079001_MSG0005
rows.name:
It is truly fortunate that we were able to escape.
If you hadn't given us sanctuary, we'd likely have
been massacred by the Ganglion. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079001_MSG0010
rows.name:
Now that Lulladu has recovered, I've been bringing
him a wide variety of voltant as a way to express my
gratitude. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079001_MSG0011
rows.name:
But I haven't been able to find anything that would
really excite a voltant enthusiast like him. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079001_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'm trying to express my gratitude as best I can!
*fsssh* I wish I could find something he'd like...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079001_MSG0013
rows.name:
Do you perchance have any ideas? *fsssh*
Something close at hand that would really wow him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079001_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Nothing? Well regardless, you still have my thanks.
You saw to it that my gorkwa was fixed, after all.[ST:wait ]
